subject: Dear sir
body:
Dear sir
We pay via wire transfer or atm master card
APPROVED {Fourteen  Million  United States Dollars}
Be notified that  {OFFICE OF THE  PRESIDENT  FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF
NIGERIA .} have approval    the sum of US$14,000,000.00 (Fourteen
Million  United States Dollars  through {United Bank Nigeria plc }  in
which  your name was  short-listed as one of the beneficiary of this
fund
Your  required to reconfirm to me the following information
1Your Full Name:---------------------------------------
Your Address:-----------------------------------------
Your Bank Details
Your Telephone Number:--------------------------------
Your Occupation--------------------------------------
As soon as i confirm your  information i will proceed with your fund transfer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WAITING
Dr Mike  Ogu
Executive Director

subject: Re:   Dear sir
body:
Dear Dr. Mike Ogu,

Thank you for your email. However, I must inform you that I cannot provide the information you requested without further details about this transaction. Could you please provide more information about how my name was selected and what this fund is for?

Best wishes,
Zachary
